name: Struggle For Light
description:
Struggle For Light is a top-down, local multiplayer, twin stick shooter with an old-school feel.

With up to 4 players, pick up weapons and upgrades, dodge bullets, kill your friends and be the last one standing !

  • Easy to play, hard to master
  • Old-school fast-paced gameplay, with rounds between 45 to 90 seconds
  • Up to 4 players local multiplayer
  • Team mode for 2vs2 action
  • 12 different items and upgrades
  • 20 different levels with specific layout and hazards
  • 7 different characters to choose from

Gather up to four friends, order some pizza and get ready !

Skill, treachery, bad faith, fast-paced gameplay, 60 seconds rounds, all you need for frantic party game action!

Within a single screen arena, gather weapons and upgrades, dodge bullets and hazards and try to kill your opponents. But if you die don't worry! Your spirit is still alive and able to suck a health point from the others, preferably from the one that killed you in the first place.

With 20 unique arenas, 12 different weapons and upgrades, an easy to learn but deep gameplay and careful balancing, Struggle For Light is a great game to pick up and play. Anyone has a shot at winning, but only through practice and knowledge of both terrain and weapons will you be able to consistently stay on top and crush your friends!

Note : Struggle For Light is for local multiplayer only. A gamepad controller is mandatory.
